claims.object: Transforming understanding of complex biological processes

surface_layer.definition: A method for measuring gene expression in specific spatial locations.

deep_layer.mechanism: RNA sequencing or other methods are used to measure gene expression in specific locations within a sample.
deep_layer.origin: Developed to overcome limitations of traditional RNA sequencing methods.

citations: Method of the Year 2024: spatial proteomics | Nature Methods
Integrated protein and transcriptome spatial profiling - PMC
